text: The 1999 Individual Speedway Junior World Championship ==Qualification== * Qualifying round: **June 6, 1999 ** Pori *Semi-Final A: **June 20, 1999 ** Rivne *Semi-Final B: **July 25, 1999 ** Ljubljana ==Final== *August 1, 1999 * Gniezno ==See also== 1999 Euro I J
title: 1999 Individual Speedway Junior European Championship
